premise_source_doc_sentence: Samuel Leroy Jackson  (  born December 21 , 1948  )  is an American actor and film producer .

claim: Samuel L. Jackson appeared in the Die Hard film series in it's third movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He achieved prominence and critical acclaim in the early 1990s with films such as Jungle Fever  (  1991  )  , Patriot Games  (  1992  )  , Amos & Andrew  (  1993  )  , True Romance  (  1993  )  , Jurassic Park  (  1993  )  and his collaborations with director Quentin Tarantino including Pulp Fiction  (  1994  )  , Jackie Brown  (  1997  )  , Django Unchained  (  2012  )  , and The Hateful Eight  (  2015  )  .

claim: Samuel L. Jackson appeared in the Die Hard film series in it's third movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is a highly prolific actor , having appeared in over 100 films , including Die Hard with a Vengeance  (  1995  )  , Unbreakable  (  2000  )  , Shaft  (  2000  )  , The 51st State  (  2001  )  , Black Snake Moan  (  2006  )  , Snakes on a Plane  (  2006  )  , and the Star Wars prequel trilogy  (  1999 -- 2005  )  , as well as the Marvel Cinematic Universe .

claim: Samuel L. Jackson appeared in the Die Hard film series in it's third movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He later cameoed as the character in a post-credits scene from Iron Man  (  2008  )  , and went on to sign a nine-film commitment to reprise this role in future films , including major roles in Iron Man 2  (  2010  )  , Marvel 's The Avengers  (  2012  )  , Captain America : The Winter Soldier  (  2014  )  and Avengers : Age of Ultron  (  2015  )  and minor roles in Thor  (  2011  )  and Captain America : The First Avenger  (  2011  )  .

claim: Samuel L. Jackson appeared in the Die Hard film series in it's third movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He has provided his voice to several animated films , television series and video games , including the roles of Lucius Best / Frozone in Pixar Animation Studios ' film The Incredibles  (  2004  )  , Mace Windu in Star Wars : The Clone Wars  (  2008  )  , Afro Samurai in the anime television series Afro Samurai  (  2007  )  , and Frank Tenpenny in the video game Grand Theft Auto : San Andreas  (  2004  )  .

claim: Samuel L. Jackson appeared in the Die Hard film series in it's third movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Die Hard with a Vengeance is a 1995 American action film and the third in the Die Hard film series .

premise_source_doc_sentence: Die Hard 2  (  sometimes referred to as Die Hard 2 : Die Harder  )  is a 1990 American action film and the second entry in the Die Hard film series .

claim: Samuel L. Jackson appeared in the Die Hard film series in it's third movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Live Free or Die Hard  (  released as Die Hard 4.0 outside North America  )  is a 2007 American action film , and the fourth installment in the Die Hard film series .

claim: Samuel L. Jackson appeared in the Die Hard film series in it's third movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A Good Day to Die Hard is a 2013 American action thriller film and the fifth installment in the Die Hard film series .

claim: Samuel L. Jackson appeared in the Die Hard film series in it's third movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It was co-produced and directed by John McTiernan  (  who directed Die Hard  )  , written by Jonathan Hensleigh , and stars Bruce Willis as New York City Police Department Lieutenant John McClane , Samuel L. Jackson as McClane 's reluctant partner Zeus Carver , and Jeremy Irons as Simon Peter Gruber .
